ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually Fear no longer does this in the Arena. They now path fairly normally when feared there. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
Actually Fear no longer does this in the Arena. They now path fairly
normally when feared there.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bill Mann [mailto:dabard@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 8:30 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
>
>
> If you are in The Arena (the zone, not the area in some
> cities), just slap a
> Fear on him, he will tp to about midway up the spire opposite
> the entrance
> to the PvP area. Run over there and just leave Fear on while
> you hack away.
> >;o)~ If you can't get Fear to work on him, Charm has the
> same effect in
> that zone (not sure about PS). You might also want to use
> Fufil's or any
> weapon's that may have a -MR proc to keep his resistance down.
>
> -=B=-
> The Rathe
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Elijah Meeker <EMEEKER@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 4:57 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
>
>
> >
> > > I would say that having his pet kill him is a pretty jerk
> thing to do,
> > since that
> > > would cause him to lose experience. i would hope that
> people on this
> list
> > aren't that
> > > nasty that they would be advocating this.
> >
> >
> > well, exp loss is also not as bad as it once was. I died in
> the basement
> of
> > /Kurn's Tower/ *winces at the thought* to a host of very green Bucky
> > Badgers, it took less than an hour at the giant fort in the Frontier
> > Mountains to get that back and then some. Just a thought,
> I don't know
> what
> > it is like at other levels. Another ameliorating factor is
> that since he
> is
> > in your guild you will be able to make yourself available
> for his ensuing
> > exp-twinking needs *smile*
> >
> > Tszaaz E'Taurguin, 32, Soi Disant Gentry, Povar
> >
> >
> >
